> OOC: Talon is Female
OOC:  Oops, sorry about that. I forget sometimes.


=
*Inside the Ark*

> <OLD>
>
> Perceptor moved close to Nightlight's bed and=
 with a very gloomy tone said
> "we must find the way to keep her quiet, we=
 dont know how well
> reprogramation process worked and she could be a dang=
er for herself and
> others... Can we keep her energy level to minimal or s=
edated her? I just
> hope that Rodimus be here soon"
>
> Nighlight made a w=
eak movement but her condition was stable

<NEW>

=93Good.=94 Bump said as =
he looked at his scanner, one of the few things having
power, and that only=
 because it had its own mobile power source. =93She=92s
going to make it.=
=94 He said, a bit of joy and relief creeping into his voice.

Santon nodde=
d and smiled as he looked at Legacy, =93We have done the
impossible yet aga=
in!=94 He said triumphantly

Legacy=92s single optic pulsed even as he cont=
inued to hold his arm in the
air, his cannon shedding light in the room. =
=93The very fact that we were able
to accomplish the feat would seem to ind=
icate that it was not impossible . .
. merely improbable.=94

Santon pursed=
 his lips, =93That=92s just semantics.=94 He said challengingly, =93You
kno=
w you did not expect us to be able to do it.=94

=93On the contrary.=94 Leg=
acy said as he moved around the room, checking other
consoles, =93With our =
combined intellect I had little doubt that it could be
accomplished in time=
. It was only the length of time that it would take that
was in question, a=
nd how much more emotional responses would inhibit the
proccess.=94

Santon=
 was about to say something else when a call came in from Rodimus,
=93Perce=
ptor! how long do we have until the tower goes up?=94

> <OLD>
>
> Elita hi=
d herself and carefully watched her sorrounding hopping to find
out
> who w=
as close to her.

<NEW>

There was more shuffling in the room with Elita, t=
hen the sound of something
sniffing. =93Elita!=94 A whispered voice said in=
 the darkness, the voice
sounding like Lord Elder. =93Where are you? I know=
 you=92re here.=94


*Outside the Ark*

> <OLD>
>
> At the Ark, Uproar and =
Quickstride nodd in compliance. They were ready for
the challenge. They tra=
nsform into their robot modes as Uproar begins to
sharpen his claws, while =
Quickstride cracks his knuckles. The young cat now
bares an enthusiastic lo=
ok on his face.
>
> " All right, I'm ready ta do this sir. No matter what h=
appens, there's no
turning tail."
>
> Quickstride also nodds.
>
> "That's r=
ight, no turning tail. It'll be like old times.."

<NEW>

Rodimus looked at=
 all of them, his optics clear and resolute. =93I don=92t know
what is goin=
g on at the battle, communications have been cut off, but we
have to trust =
that Tuscon and the others are able to handle themselves.=94

Pointing to t=
he ark Rodimus=92 face turned grim, =93Our focus is here and now.
We don=92=
t know who or how many are in the Ark and who has taken her. But we
do know=
 that if we don=92t get back in, everyone=92s life is in danger, not only
o=
ur lives and the Maximals, but also Optimus Prime, and the other Autobots
t=
hat are suppose to wake up a couple of million years from now.=94

=93Be re=
ady.=94 He said in serious tones. =93When Perceptor gives me the go ahead,
=
I will activate this device and we enter the Ark.=94 He took a moment to lo=
ok
at each one of them, =93It is almost time.=94 he said with a tone of fin=
ality.


*At the battle*

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson nodds.
>
> " All right. Let's =
- regroup, as Noctorro has advised."
>
> As he tries to stand up, he finds =
his condition too far advanced, as he
falls to his knees once more, unable =
to get up on his own. He finds just
enough energy to get into vehicle mode,=
 seeing that this way, at least he
could be towwed to saftey, rolling on wh=
eels rather than being dragged,
which would be difficult to do otherwise.
>=

> " Here- in - this mode, it will - be easier for me - to ambulate."

<NEW=
>

As Tuscon attempted to transform and move away with the help of the othe=
rs,
Noctorro stands up, rising to his full and imposing height! Not having =
many
of the larger weapons, Noctorro does what he does best, he leapt into =
the
fray, using his large horns and immense size to batter down as many of =
the
Predacons as he can.

At the same time Torca, stands as well, his size =
actually a few inches
taller and more massive than Noctorro! =93Silverbolt!=
 Airhammer!=94 Torca calls,
his voice booming across the battlefield. =93At=
tack pattern theta 4!=94

With that Silverbot, who looked to be a cross bet=
ween a wolf and an eagle,
and Airhammer who looked like both shark and hawk=
 move quickly through the
air, brining their firepower out in an attempt to=
 disorient the Predacons!

For a moment it seems to have that sort of affec=
t as the sweeps pull back
and Phobia is forced to abort her next attack run=
 as the Fuzors make their
presence known.

As Waspinator and Terrorsaur att=
empt to swing around to help, Bantor fired
several shots from his weapon st=
epping out from the trees, surprise and his
firepower for the moment holdin=
g them at bay.

Torca looked over at Tuscon and the others and then turned =
back to the
battle, bringing his own Dorsal guns into play!

> <OLD>
>
> In=
 the battle field Talon continued moving and shooting, she didnt know
how
>=
 long could keep her enemis away, Kup watched her desperate situation and
>=
 open fire against the predacons.
>
> Hydras was really mad and said By com=
link "Perceptor alway has more than a
> trick in his sleeve... PREDACONS WE=
 MUST RETREAT!!!!! FOLLoW ME!!!!" The
> predacon leader took off and with a=
 devil smile he did a single shot
agains
> Talon, hitting her in one of her=
 wings; Talon Scream in pain and start to
> falling to the ground while she=
 struggling to keep her in air. Then the
> Predacon leader started to leave=
 the area.

<NEW>

Hydras gets a message from Cyclonus, =93I cannot stop th=
e destruction.
Perceptor has planned this too well. If you don=92t have an =
override code of
some type I=92m leaving!=94

> <OLD>
>
> Even in truck mod=
e, Tucson could hear Talon's scream of pain. And that
> was enough to energ=
ize him just enough to get him to roll quickly toward
> Talon, as he opens =
his cab doors right beside her.
>
> "Night Shift, get - Talon into my cab, =
now!"

<NEW>

Skyshadow laughed as he watched Talon fall, =93Stay down!=94 =
he said menacingly
as he oriented his weapon on her downed form. =93This wi=
ll only take a mome .
. .=94

*>>BOOM!!<<*

Skyshadow is hit by a blast fro=
m Torca which sends him spinning into the air
and sliding back several mete=
rs.

=93YOU!=94 he said, hatred written clearly on Skyshadow=92s face. =93Y=
ou and your
accursed Fuzors!=94

Torca just smiled as he held his weapon on=
 him, =93You heard what your boss
said, FLEE or face my wrath!=94

Meanwhil=
e Noctorro leaped inbetween the Predacons and Talon, catching
Injector and =
Buzzclaw and sent them flying through the air as well! =93Go!=94 he
said, h=
is vcoie deep and dangerous.

Without a backwards glance they took off into=
 the air, fleeing after their
master, Hydras! The other Predacons, seeing h=
is flight began pulling out as
well.

> <OLD>
>
> Night Shift is quick to f=
ollow orders, as he carefully places Talon
> on Tucson's front seat. Tucson=
 shuts his doors and secures her gently
> so she doesn't fall when he moves=
. It was just enough energy to secure
> her, as his engine slows and once a=
gain, is idol.
>
> "Talon - I want you to - know that it will take more tha=
n just a shot =96
> to my arm to stop me completely. Hydras will pay for wh=
at - he has done
> to you. I promise you that."

*Inside the tower*
* *
> <=
OLD>
>
> Windlord Quicly followed Rattrap when he reached the exit he took =
off and
> grabs Rattrap by his tail and quickly started to move away. Meanw=
hile the
> BlackFortress count to zero continues... 2 mins to Explotion.

<=
NEW>

The way out of the tower is apparently unguarded, Scourge is no where=
 to be
seen, probably having much better things to do like plan his own esc=
ape
strategy.

In any event the hole that Rat Trap and Windlord had used to=
 enter was still
available, and when they looked out they could see that th=
e Magma beneath
the tower was beginning to froth and churn as if it was som=
ehow beginning to
boil deep beneath.

Meanwhile the female voice was contin=
uing its count down. =931 minute to
destruction! Minimum safe distance is 1=
0 miles.=94

(TAG)

Preston
